TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PseudonymRequestMessage extends System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationMessage

Docs.summary: Represents a WS-Federation Pseudonym Request message. This message is created when the received message wa parameter is “wpseudo1.0”.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about the message that this class represents, see the WS-Federation specification.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Uri baseUrl) cil managed

Docs.param: The base URL to which this message applies.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified base URL.
Gets or sets the wpseudo parameter of the message.
Docs.value: A string that contains the value of the wpseudo parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Set to `null` or an empty string to remove the wpseudo parameter from the message.

Docs.returns: A string that contains the value of the wpseudo parameter.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the wpseudoptr parameter of the message.
Docs.value: A string that contains the value of the wpseudoptr parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Set to `null` or an empty string to remove the wpseudoptr parameter from the message.

Docs.exception: An attempt to set a value that is not a valid URI occurs.
Docs.returns: A string that contains the value of the wpseudoptr parameter.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the Reply parameter of the message.
Docs.value: A string that contains the value of the wreply parameter. This is the URL to which the reply should be sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Set to `null` or an empty string to remove the wreply parameter from the message.

Docs.exception: An attempt to set a value that is not a valid URI occurs.
Docs.returns: A string that contains the value of the wreply parameter. This is the URL to which the reply should be sent.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the wresult parameter of the message.
Docs.value: A string that contains the value of the wresult parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Set to `null` or an empty string to remove the wresult parameter from the message.

Docs.returns: A string that contains the value of the wresult parameter.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the wresultptr parameter of the message.
Docs.value: A string that contains the value of the wresultptr parameter. This is a URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Set to `null` or an empty string to remove the wresultptr parameter from the message.

Docs.exception: An attempt to set a value that is not a valid URI occurs.
Docs.returns: A string that contains the value of the wresultptr parameter. This is a URI.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Validate() cil managed

Docs.summary: No validation is performed by the framework. Users of this class should validate externally.

remarks.format: ## Remarks No validation is performed by the framework. Users of this class should validate externally.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Write(class System.IO.TextWriter writer) cil managed

Docs.param: The text writer to which to write the message.
Docs.summary: Writes this message in a query string form to the specified text writer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.PseudonymReqeustMessage.Validate%2A> method before writing the message.
